p:
In another study on zebrafish; growth, survival rate and condition factors of fish fed for 9â€‰weeks with five different commercial diets and two different diets (prepared in the laboratory) were investigated. Live weight gain in fish-fed laboratory diet was found higher than others. While there was no statistically significant difference between the groups in terms of condition factor, the survival rate was found to be the highest (with 100%) in the group fed commercial diet
38 .
